urls.title: Coronavirus a contributing factor to Lehigh Valley patient’s death, coroner says
urls.description: The patient died Friday night at St. Luke's University Hospital in Fountain Hill, the Lehigh County coroner confirmed.

text:
@DineshDSouza @realDonaldTrump This is my favorite (paragraph 3):
"He said the primary cause of the man’s death was a head injury from a fall at home, but that the virus was listed as a contributing factor to his death."  https://t.co/ZptFgOGTgi
